howWeMet.title: How We Met
howWeMet.description: We first crossed paths at a mutual friend's birthday party. What started as a casual conversation about our shared love for travel turned into hours of talking and laughing. We exchanged numbers that night, and the rest, as they say, is history.

firstDate.title: Our First Date
firstDate.description: For our first date, we went to a small Italian restaurant downtown. We talked for hours over pasta and wine, losing track of time completely. The waiter had to politely let us know they were closing!

proposal.title: The Proposal
proposal.description: On Christmas Eve, during a trip to the mountains, we went for a sunset hike to a beautiful overlook. As the sky turned pink and gold, I got down on one knee and asked the most important question of my life. And she said yes!

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.message: We're pleased you received our invitation. We are so excited to invite you to celebrate our special day with us, our family and our closest friends! Here we've put together all the important details to help make your experience as smooth and enjoyable as possible. You'll find information about the venue, schedule, travel, accommodation, and anything else you might need to plan your trip. We can't wait to create beautiful memories with all of you in England!

items.event: Arrival party, check ins, tea and coffees
Bride and groom entrance and speeches commence

attire.title: Attire
attire.note: Please keep in mind January is wintertime in the UK. Although inside the venue will be very warm and comfortable, please bring additional clothing to keep warm during your traveling.

women.title: Women
guidelines: Floor length, Midi or knee-length dress, suits ok, or sophisticated skirt and blouse combo
Heels, dressy sandals, or stylish flats
women.note: We kindly ask our guests to please avoid white, cream or ivory block color outfits.

men.title: Men
guidelines: Dark or neutral-colored suit (navy, charcoal, or grey)

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.description: Davenport house can accommodate up to 40 guests over 9 bedrooms and 3 cottages. We have booked these rooms and offer them at a discounted rate to our guests. Priority will be given to those who have flown from overseas and wedding party. There are also a selection of local hotels available for those who would like some freedom in their choice of room. Please let us know your accommodation needs and we will arrange a room for you.

travel.title: Travel
travel.description: For those joining us from abroad: The closest airport is Birmingham Airport (BHX). From here, it's about 45 minutes to Worfield by car or taxi. Alternatively, you can take a train from Birmingham new street station which is about 30 minutes. Those flying into London Heathrow Airport: Worfield is about 220 kilometers away. You can rent a car for a drive of approximately 2 hours and 30 minutes, or take a train from London to Wolverhampton, followed by a taxi to Worfield.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.description: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift we could ask for! As we're celebrating abroad and won't be able to take physical gifts home, if you'd like to give a gift, an optional financial contribution towards our future together would be truly appreciated. But most of all, we're just grateful to celebrate this special day with you!

rsvp.title: RSVP
rsvp.subtitle: We look forward to celebrating with you!
rsvp.confirmation: Thank you for your RSVP! We can't wait to celebrate with you.
